resource.chars:
other plates taken at 
various times all 
showing similar dis-
cordances.
Again, if we measure 
the four stars in the <u>Trap
ezium<\u> of Orion, the dis-
cordances are equally 
evident, thus, [diagram] star <u>a<\u>,
with exposure of <u>one second <\u>
measures 260 divisions,
and if we take the differences 
in diameter after each
exposure up to 32 seconds 
they are as follows:-
star <u>a<\u>, 50, 38, 22, 30, 60.
star <u>b<\u>, 46, 16, 45, 35, 27
star <u>c<\u> 42, 20, 15, 65, 27
star <u>d<\u>, -, 5, 50, 20, 20
After an exposure of 32 seconds
